name: Cuby!
description:
Hello! This is VirtualJake coming up with content for ya! This Is CUBY! A tough platformer thats cool. This is my first game in development so yeah. Please consider donating so I can hopefully get these things done:

  1. Music(plz contact me if you think you got something)
  2. More content and levels
  3. perhaps some skins?
  4. Randomly generated levels for infinite fun?

So yeah...      <(owo)>
